sentences.sentence: Last year, Sichuan ranked seventh nationwide in terms of the number of divorcees.
sentences.translation: 去年，四川离异人数位列全国第七。

sentences.sentence: More often than not, divorcees in this age group will likely have a young child at home.
sentences.translation: 通常，这个年龄段离婚的人已生有子女。

sentences.sentence: This is also the age group in which the first divorcees will begin to make their appearance.
sentences.translation: 这个年龄段也是人们开始离婚的时候。
